thread.title: Major disruption to train route between Swansea and London
thread.title_full: Major disruption to train route between Swansea and London | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Major disruption to train route between Swansea and London
text:
Thousands of rugby fans will be travelling to the city for today's match Credit: PA There is major disruption on a main train route between London Paddington and Swansea after a person was hit by a train.
All transport routes in and out of Cardiff are expected to be busier than usual with the Wales V Fiji match being held at the Millennium Stadium.
The incident happened between Swindon and Bristol Parkway but is likely to disrupt trains travelling to Swansea.
More: Delays between Newport and Cardiff train stations
Last updated Thu 1 Oct 2015 Travel Wales
